divs: sighting detailsi am in the roof of my house observing the sky up to the amanecer.cuando suddenly this luminous object appears going of northwest on south in a slow form and doing a few pulsations of light. the first object made me notice that towards a few intense flashes of light. it(he,she) observes it sideward with the eyes while it(he,she) was observing towards another direction. habia noticed an intense sheen because of it me habia called the attention. this hard object several minutes furrowing the sky very slowly and proving to be very anomalous before the sight of anyone knowing that this was not a terrestrial known object. i have not felt ningun strange symptom on having observed this phenomenon since it(he,she) was going high and believe that one has to be closely together to be able to feel some sensation. to the object i have lost it in the moment that approaches almost the horizon and stops expressing(emitting) pulsations of light or flashes. here i leave them the link of the video that upload to the youtube. http:\\es.youtube.com\watch?v=bcear_deumg
